mapper.sql: id, task_id, waybill_no, discount_amount, derate_amount, is_calculated, calculate_time, write_time, remark
mapper.select: select a.id, a.task_id, a.waybill_no, a.discount_amount, a.derate_amount, a.is_calculated, a.calculate_time, a.write_time, a.remark,b.create_time,b.customerid from fees_receive_dispatch_discount a inner join biz_dispatch_bill b on a.waybill_no=b.waybill_no where 1=1

select a.customerid as customerId, a.carrier_id as carrierId, count(0) as orderCount, sum(b.amount) as amount from biz_dispatch_bill a left join fees_receive_dispatch b on a.fees_no = b.fees_no and b.del_flag=0 where a.create_time >= #{startTime} and a.create_time<#{endTime} and a.customerid = #{customerId} and a.carrier_id =#{carrierId} and a.del_flag = 0 and a.is_calculated != '5' group by a.customerid,a.carrier_id
